songs.title: Tell The World I’m Alive
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Pray to see thy Heaven
Pray to see the Earth
Pray for those who're praying

[Verse 2]
Pray to see thy Heaven
Land who's all away
Pray for those who're staying

[Verse 3]
Circus Man, he has died
Tell the world, I'm alive
I know just what I want
I know how far I'm gone
I got to cry my goodbye

[Verse 4]
Love was made for me
Love was made for me
